item.title: Venezuela live updates: Photos show handcuffed Maduro escorted by DEA administrator
item.description: The president of Venezuela was taken by American forces and transported to the U.S. Saturday to face federal drug charges.

item.title: WATCH: President Trump addresses nation after capture of Venezuelan President Maduro
item.description: The announcement came a few hours after explosions rocked the Venezuelan capital, Caracas.
